meanings.definition: A viral disease of poultry characterized by anemia and enlargement of the liver and spleen.
meanings.sent1: The farmer was worried about the leukosis spreading among the chickens.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian diagnosed the flock with leukosis.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken invite the leukosis to the party? For a sick hen dance!
meanings.sent4: The leukosis crept through the coop like a shadow, casting illness in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The red comb of the chicken turned pale with the onset of leukosis.

meanings.definition: A form of cancer affecting the white blood cells.
meanings.sent1: Leukosis can weaken the body's ability to fight infections.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended a treatment plan for the patient's leukosis.
meanings.sent3: Why did the white blood cell break up with the leukosis? It was too clingy!
meanings.sent4: The leukosis invaded the bloodstream like an army of rogue cells.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed the chaotic battle between healthy cells and leukosis.
